divs: Sighting Details11-11-11 It was a clear night 360 degree view of the Universe from where I live.Every night I look and marvel at the skies.This particular night,I had just arrived at home.As soon as I got out of the car, I noticed a bright light that seemed to be "out of place". I looked to my South and saw a very large, dull amber colored sphere. At first I thought is was a I then looked to my North and witnessed the North star,trying to make a comparison of the two.There are tons of sattelites encircling all of the time, but for some reason 3-4 sattelites went off course and made a beeline toward this object.The sattelites appeared to be taking pictures of the sphere, and all of a sudden, the sphere starting shooting beams towards the sattelites. Meanwhie,other unidentifiable aircraft(2 planes)began to hover to the East of me, not making a sound. The sattelites in succession started backing up. The sphere began to glow brighter,let off a sonic boom and went out like a light. I fell to my knees in disbelief.The sattelites hovered in the same area for 30 minutes, then continued their regular paths.I'm so glad that I had other people to witness this marvelous event as well.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Spring Hill
There were no other sightings in Spring Hill on or around November 11th 2011
Summary: saw large amber light hovering;3-4 satellites beelined to light;object shot beams at sattelites and light made sonic boom sound and dissapeared
